about_the_game: This original soundtrack was produced to commemorate the first anniversary of the release of "Relayer". The complete soundtrack includes all 33 songs used in "Relayer" and "Relayer Advanced". It includes the ending theme song "Into the Lost Code" sung by KOCHO, a collaboration with the "STARLY GIRLS", and more.
